BIO

Hi, my name is Martin Patrik. I am a happy, energetic and friendly 18 years old guy. I'm a self taught front-end developer. I love creating interactive web application and websites. The tolls that I use the most are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, React and Git. In this summer I am about to graduate high-school. I want to try my self out as full time developer in the near future, because I always loved IT and I always wanted to be a developer.
